mapper.select: SELECT rn, board_number, board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_createdate, reply_count FROM (SELECT rownum rn, board_number, board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_createdate, reply_count from csboard where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} ORDER BY board_number DESC
SELECT * FROM csboard c WHERE c.board_number=#{board_number}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO csboard(board_number, board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_createdate, board_updatedate, board_secret) VALUES(csboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '0')
